### Reading RDS data

```{r}
complaints <- readRDS("complaints.rds")
```

### Chart 1
    
```{r}

ggplot(complaintsby_date, aes(x= date_received, y= n)) +
geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  labs(main= "Complaints by Date Received", x= "Date Received", y= "Number of Complaints")

```
    
### Chart 2

```{r}
ggplot(complaintsby_product, aes(x = product, y = n)) +
  geom_col(position = "stack") +
  scale_y_continuous(label=comma)+
  coord_flip()+
  labs(title = 'Complaints by Product',) +
  theme_classic() +
  xlab('Product Type') +
  ylab('Number of Complaints') +
  theme(axis.text.x = 
          element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5))

```

### Chart 3

```{r}
ggplot(complaintsby_state, aes(x = state, y = n)) +
```
